Both tetrabenazine and tiapride are chemical compounds used in pharmacological treatments. Tetrabenazine is a dopamine receptor agonist used to treat movement disorders, while tiapride is a dopamine receptor antagonist used to treat schizophrenia and other neuropsychiatric disorders.
